data.message: System check and hookify optimization: Diagnosed hook hangs caused by hookify plugin. Disabled plugin, merged 7 .local.md rules into enforcement_patterns.json v2.0 (11 hard rules). Deleted redundant files. System now lean and fast with same protection level.
data.outcome: Diagnosed hook hangs caused by hookify plugin. Disabled plugin, merged 7 .local.md rules into enforcement_patterns.json v2.0 (11 hard rules). Deleted redundant files. System now lean and fast with same protection level.
